text: Judd Apatow, Nick Davis to Produce ‘Godspell’ Doc on Legendary 1972 Toronto Production Judd Apatow and Nick Davis are producing a documentary about the legendary 1972 Toronto production of the musical “Godspell” that featured several … Related storyboards More stories from [Judd Apatow](/topic/juddapatow) [Stormy Daniels and Judd Apatow Bring a Personal and Political Doc to SXSW: ‘F— Trump’](/topic/juddapatow/stormy-daniels-and-judd-apatow-bring-a-personal-and-political-doc-to-sxsw-f-t/a-fcTdtiTOSKKMdMH1hAkVqw%3Aa%3A1819762525-ad071e9ac2%2Fvariety.com) Stormy Daniels cried and laughed during the SXSW world premiere of “Stormy,” a Peacock documentary about the porn star who made national headlines … [John Cena has found his post-WWE niche as a raunchy comedy king](/topic/juddapatow/john-cena-has-found-his-post-wwe-niche-as-a-raunchy-comedy-king/a-Jaq14vu6RB68pT8NVi9yKQ%3Aa%3A141172479-e3a5184ad9%2Fmashable.com) Like Hogan with the NWO, Cena has embraced a new side of himself. If there's one good thing you can say about Amazon Prime's Ricky Stanicky (which isn't a lot), it's that John Cena is the best part of the film.
